fields.name: Ability:
fields.value: - Choose one person each night to visit. You will trick them into revealing their true identity to the town.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If you are lynched, you will be invincible and cannot be killed for the rest of the game.
- You have the ability to alter your appearance and disguise yourself as any role in the game. You will appear to have the same investigative results as that role.
- You will show up as a town member in investigative results.
- If at any point during the game, a player correctly identifies you as the Mastermind Trickster, you win.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Trick the town into lynching you and reveal your true identity as the Mastermind Trickster without being caught by the town.
